## üìã Axiom Driven Engineering Workflow

1. **Define Axioms** ‚Äî Establish project principles via constitution
2. **Create Specifications** ‚Äî Use Spec-Kit to define features
3. **Plan Implementation** ‚Äî Generate technical plans
4. **Break Down Tasks** ‚Äî Create atomic work items
5. **Execute (RED‚ÜíGREEN)** ‚Äî Test-first implementation
6. **Verify** ‚Äî Confirm spec compliance
7. **Analyze** ‚Äî Post-implementation review

---

## üèóÔ∏è Repository Standards

All First ADE repositories MUST include:

- [ ] `CONSTITUTION.md` ‚Äî Project axioms subset
- [ ] `.specify/` ‚Äî Spec-Kit configuration
- [ ] `docs/adr/` ‚Äî Architecture Decision Records
- [ ] `.gemini.md` / `.claude.md` ‚Äî AI context files
- [ ] CI/CD workflows ‚Äî Automated testing

## üîê Security & Compliance

- Report vulnerabilities via [SECURITY.md](./SECURITY.md)
- Follow the [Code of Conduct](./CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- All PRs require review before merge
